title: Welcome to Austin's second downtown!
posting_body: Text ID # 9801A to my cell for more info!
There seems to be two sides to Austin.
Of course, there’s the honky-tonk, barbeque, and beer of Sixth Street and South Lamar…and then there’s the rest of the city.
Which is actually quite picturesque, with green rolling hills, winding streets, towering trees, and about a million golf courses.
The Balcones neighborhood epitomizes the more mellow side of Austin perfectly: it’s peaceful and residential, a great place to come home to after a hectic day.
And right smack dab in the middle of all this peacefulness is Balcones, lovely apartments with all the makings to make you feel very, very comfortable.
First, the apartments here are downright roomy, averaging more than 1,000 square feet, with open layouts and nice touches like high ceilings, huge windows, and built-in laptop stations.
Our location is nothing short of spectacular, in the heart of Austin’s ‘second downtown’ and tech corridor.
Here, you’re just minutes to the Apple Campus, eBay, PayPal, and other major employers.
We’ve clocked our drive to all the great shopping at The Domain at 12 minutes (with traffic!).
The Lakeline Metro stop is a five-minute hop and skip.
Jump on Highway 183 and motor into Austin and beyond.
When it comes to service, we aim to please at Balcones.
You can count on our team to deliver on what we promise and to get the details right
so you don’t have to worry about a thing.
When you’re apartment hunting in Austin, be sure that Balcones makes your shortlist.
